scripts.id:both: npm run id:anchor && npm run id:lib
scripts.idl:init:sollery: anchor idl init  -f target/idl/sollery.json `solana address -k target/deploy/sollery-keypair.json`
scripts.idl:upgrade:sollery: anchor idl upgrade  -f target/idl/sollery.json `solana address -k target/deploy/sollery-keypair.json`
scripts.idl:init:calculator: anchor idl init  -f target/idl/calculator.json `solana address -k target/deploy/calculator-keypair.json`
scripts.idl:upgrade:calculator: anchor idl upgrade  -f target/idl/calculator.json `solana address -k target/deploy/calculator-keypair.json`
scripts.idl:init:both: npm run idl:init:sollery && npm run idl:init:calculator
scripts.idl:upgrade:both: npm run idl:upgrade:sollery && npm run idl:upgrade:calculator
scripts.project:init: rm -fr target && seahorse build; anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run id:both && anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run idl:init:both && cd ../app && npm run generate-data-account
scripts.project:upgrade: seahorse build; anchor build && anchor deploy && npm run idl:upgrade:both
